zulutils 0.5.2
  • Reference

Function reference

All functions

bgrep()
Boolean grep function
catty()
Construct a catty vector
cb_apply_col_spec()
Apply a col_spec to a data.frame
cb_as_col_spec_factors()
Construct code to use as col_spec for factors
dhondt() largest_remainder()
Allocate discrete seats given continuous votes
get_drake_target_size()
Return the size of a drake target
get_drake_target_sizes()
Return the size of all targets in a drake plan
get_labels_enframed()
Get the variable labels of a labelled tibble in an enframed tibble
gg_apply()
Apply a function to each label and character/factor variable in the plot object.
gg_apply_labs()
Apply a string function to each label present in the plot object
gg_integer_breaks()
Apply integer breaks to a graph.
mutate_cond()
Mutate only rows of data.frame/tibble that satisfy condition
na_if_in()
Replace values in x that are contained in y with NA.
na_replace()
Replace missing values
noop()
Return a single argument unchanged
notate() ViewNotated() ViewAnnotated()
Embed factor levels and value labels in values.
lpad() rpad()
Pad string with space or other characters
rename_enframed()
Rename tibble columns according to values in another tibble.
sample_strings()
Sample a set of strings, each string of a given length
zulu_letters
A lookup table for the phonetic alphabet

Developed by Magnus Thor Torfason.
